snippet.title: Sophia the Traveler Trailer | Day of the Devs: The Game Awards Edition 2023
snippet.description:
Yay! Sophia the Traveler is set to launch on #Steam in 2024!
Come check out the exclusive trailer of Sophia the Traveler for Day of the Devs: The Game Awards Edition 2023!💖 #indiegame #hiddenobjectgame 

Wishlist on Steam and stay tuned👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1602540/Sophia_the_Traveler/
Check all the other brilliant games!👉 https://store.steampowered.com/curator/43041140/sale/dayofthedevstga2023

Sophia the Traveler is a wholesome and cozy hidden object adventure, offering a delightful 'Where's Waldo'-style exploration.

Sophia the Traveler is developed by a loving couple who really wish to visit Venice but have never actually been there. But they managed to recreate a vivid and bustling Venice in a cute hand-painted art style entirely based on travel books and Google map!

And now, they've created a girl named Sophia, who loves life, music and good food. And hope that she will take you to Venice with this game.🥰
